name: CreateNewTag
description:
Create a new tag within the system.

This tool is used to create a new tag by sending a POST request to the /tags endpoint. It should be called when a user wants to add a new tag to the system for organizational or categorization purposes.

parameters.name: tag_creation_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details of the tag to be created: 'hex_color' for the color code, 'object_type' to specify the associated object ('account', 'issue', or 'contact'), and 'value' for the tag's name.

hex_color.description: The hex code of the tag's color.

object_type.description: The object type of the associated object. Can be "account", "issue", or "contact".
